subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] What?--Not another!
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hey Frank,

at the end of your clip, I can hear very clearly:

00:00:10 "Talk" (male voice)
00:00:11 "Talk to me! - You don't talk." (female voice)

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Stefan/20080402_Frank_Talk-TalkToMe-YouDontTalk.mp3

I remember you said that you don't talk or ask questions during EVP
recordings. Well, obviously your spirits want you to talk to them! :)

Stefan

-- 


> Yeah, it sounds like a box--dah! However the background noise and
> static is less---and FM is very good. This is the best FM box I've
> ever had. I added the mic amp and switch jack so it can be used
> direct, or with echo chamber last night and this morning. The speaker
> is old, from an Army Jeep, I scavenged it while in Germany back in the
> 70s, I used it for an external CB antenna, then on portable ham rigs,
> then in early echo boxes. The green board is the 12-469.
 
 
 
>  FRank-S
